about_the_game:
World Champions: Decathlon – A Retro Sports Arcade Experience

Jump into the action of the ultimate multi-sport challenge with World Champions: Decathlon! Test your endurance, speed, and precision across 10 thrilling events in this pixel-perfect, retro sports game that captures the nostalgia of classic arcade sports games.

Compete in a Decathlon like never before! Master events like the 100m sprint, pole vault, long jump, discus, and more in this fast-paced, action-packed arcade experience. Whether you’re playing solo or challenging friends in local multiplayer, World Champions: Decathlon offers endless fun and competitive excitement for all types of players.

Key Features:

  • 10 Action-Packed Events: Experience the thrill of classic decathlon events, including sprints, jumps, throws, and more!

  • Retro Pixel Art: Dive into a colorful, pixelated world inspired by the golden age of retro arcade games with smooth animations and charming visuals.

  • Competitive Sports Gameplay: Challenge yourself to beat your best scores or go head-to-head with friends in local multiplayer mode for a real test of your competitive spirit.

  • Simple Yet Addictive Mechanics: Easy to pick up but hard to master! Perfect for both casual players and competitive sports fans alike.

  • Olympic-Inspired: The excitement of track and field meets the precision of endurance sports in this action-packed title.

  • Family-Friendly Fun: Easy to play for all ages, with a friendly learning curve for newcomers to the genre.

  • Seasonal Competitions & Hall of Fame: New seasons reset the leaderboard each quarter. Compete for top scores, and if you make it, you’ll earn a spot in the prestigious Hall of Fame!

  • Endless Replayability: Always a chance to improve your score! Even after reaching your peak, you can come back in a week or month and set new records.

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Pixel Art Sports: A perfect blend of retro arcade sports and modern competitive gameplay that will keep you coming back for more.

  • Multiplayer Action: Team up or compete in local co-op or competitive multiplayer and enjoy the ultimate sports experience with family and friends.

  • Casual Yet Challenging: Whether you’re looking for a quick gaming session or aiming to master every event, World Champions: Decathlon delivers both casual fun and serious competition.

  • Nostalgic Arcade Feel: Get that classic arcade vibe with fast, accessible gameplay that’s perfect for short bursts of action or longer, more challenging sessions.

Get ready to race, jump, throw, and vault your way to victory in World Champions: Decathlon—the ultimate retro sports challenge for indie game lovers and fans of arcade sports games!
